short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to search for wine ratings from vivino

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension adds a context menu that can be used to search for a wine from vivino.com.
The extension will display the best match as a toast. This is mainly used to get ratings for a wine, and a link to read some user reviews.
